name: Notion Task Manager
description: Never miss a To-do thanks to the Task Manager Notion template.Do you have difficulties keeping track of your tasks?The Notion Task Manager is made for you! Use this template to effectively manage your tasks, stay organized, and never miss an important to-do again.Be more productive and organized every day.Create tasks using the convenient "New Task" button. Mark them as completed and review them later in your logbook.Get things done easily by organizing your tasks by area.Assign tasks by area an
features: a dashboard to keep track of your tasks; a space to assign your tasks by areas; + A free guide to fully catch the template features
